name: Enmity
description:
Be the gunner of a AC-130, while defending and surviving as long as you can.

Defend a bunker conducting a research study, which needs to be valued and protected at all expenses. Waves of enemy infantry are incoming, different sides with Rifles and Rockets. Every wave, becoming more difficult and without many supplies. Every kill made grants money, which can be used to purchase upgrades and air-support.

It's all up to you, defend at will. We can't afford to lose our vital studies on the enemy.

CONTROLS: Tab - Upgrades, Escape - Control Panel/Pause Menu, Left Click - Fire, Mouse Scroll Wheel - Switch Weapons.

DOWNLOAD TUTORIAL:

1. Download "Enmity v1.0.zip"

2. Extract or decompress the .zip file

3. Open the extracted or decompressed file, double click Enmity
